snippet: Andy Murray defeated Tomas Berdych in four sets, but severe weather conditions caused the day’s other two big matches — the second men’s semifinal and the women’s final — to be postponed.
abstract: Andy Murray defeats Tomas Berdych to advance to the men's finals at the United States Open; second men's semifinal between David Ferrer and Novak Djokovic is suspended because of weather; women's final between Victoria Azarenka and Serena Williams is also postponed.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray defeated Tomas Berdych in four sets, but severe weather conditions caused the day’s other two big matches — the second men’s semifinal and the women’s final — to be postponed.

headline.seo: Andy Murray Advances to U.S. Open Final Amid Weather Delays
headline.main: Super Saturday Skies: Cloudy, Partly Happy
headline.print_headline: Super Saturday Skies: Cloudy, Partly Happy
